document.full_text: six-time defending champion rafael nadal reached the monte carlo masters final with a 6-4, 2-6, 6-1 victory saturday over andy murray, who needed a cortisone shot in his right arm before the match.
document.title: nadal reaches 7th straight monte carlo final
lines_and_colors: six-time defending champion rafael nadal reached the monte carlo masters final with a 6-4, 2-6, 6-1 victory saturday over andy murray, who needed a cortisone shot in his right arm before the match.
